Name: Ajoblanco
Description: a cold soup made of bread , crushed almonds , garlic , water , olive oil , salt and sometimes vinegar . It is usually served with grapes or slices of melon

Name: Cocido Cocidos
Description: a traditional chickpea-based stew from Madrid , Spain made with vegetables , potatoes and meat

Name: Escudella
Description: a dense soup with big pasta

Name: Gazpacho
Description: a cold soup made with raw tomato , cucumber , pepper , onion and some garlic , olive oil , wine vinegar , water , and salt . Typically drunk in summer

Name: Marmitako Marmita or Sorropotún
Description: a dish with tuna , potatoes , onions , pimientos , and tomatoes

Name: Olla podrida
Description: a Spanish stew made from pork and beans and other meats and vegetables

Name: Ollada
Description: boiling vegetables and meat in a casserole

Name: Pipérade
Type: a main or a side dish
Description: a Basque dish typically prepared with onion , green peppers , and tomatoes sautéd in olive oil and flavored with Espelette pepper

Name: Pisto Pisto manchego
Description: a dish made of tomatoes , onions , eggplant or courgettes , green and red peppers and olive oil . It is similar to ratatouille and is usually served warm to accompany a dish or with a fried egg and bread . It is also used as the filling for empanadillas and empanadas

Name: Salmorejo
Description: A thick cold soup based on tomato , bread , olive oil and garlic , originating in Córdoba ( Andalusia ) . It is garnished with diced Spanish Serrano ham and diced hard-boiled eggs
